product_overview: Fastfive is a modern web platform using the latest technologies like Next.js 16, React 19, and Tailwind CSS v4, designed to provide a smooth and performant user experience for tour bookings and content presentation.
core_goals: Ensure compatibility and stability with experimental tech stack Next.js 16 and React 19
Deliver smooth scrolling and performant UI using GSAP and Lenis animation libraries
Provide reusable and accessible UI components for consistent design across the site
Implement an engaging and user-friendly tour booking page
Optimize web performance by using Next.js built-in image and font optimization features
key_features: Root layout with global styles, fonts, and a smooth scrolling context for consistent look and feel
Reusable UI components including Buttons, Cards, Sections, and specialized components like MagneticButton and GlassCard
Tour booking page with all necessary booking actions and flows
Use of modern animation libraries GSAP and Lenis to enhance UI interactions
PostCSS and Tailwind CSS v4 integration with configuration for best styling practices
user_flow_summary: User lands on homepage with smooth scrolling and sees content sections styled consistently
User navigates to the Tour page to browse available tours
User interacts with booking forms and actions to complete a tour reservation
Site ensures smooth client-side rendering with immediate feedback on interactions
System manages fonts and images to reduce layout shifts and improve load times
validation_criteria: Verify no CSS warnings or errors related to Tailwind v4 in VS Code and build process
Ensure package dependencies for Next.js, React, GSAP, Lenis, and other libs are compatible and stable
Confirm there are no React hydration errors due to HTML semantic or client component misconfiguration
Check that all client components using browser APIs include explicit "use client" directive
Validate usage of Next.js next/font/local for fonts and next/image for images for optimization and CLS reduction
End-to-end testing of Tour booking flow for functional correctness
